title: How to Make Vegan Chocolate Cake

steps.headline: Grease the cake pan lightly.
steps.description: Since there is no oil in this recipe, it will stick if you skip this step.

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (180 degrees C).
Stir all of the dry ingredients together in a large bowl (the first 6 on the list).
Mix all of the wet ingredients in a separate bowl.
Pour the wet mixture into the dry mixture, in two equal amounts, while mixing well after each addition, but be careful not to over mix.
steps.description: Just make sure there are no big lumps in the batter.

steps.headline: Pour the batter into your prepared cake pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes.
steps.description: Since ovens vary, the cake is done when it has risen to double its size, and springs back up if you press on it. Stick a toothpick in the cake to check if it is fully baked. If the toothpick is removed dry, it is ready to eat.

steps.headline: Remove the cake from the pan after it has cooled for 5 minutes.
steps.description: This will be easy if you oiled the pan.

steps.headline: Spread a vegan chocolate frosting around the cake.
steps.description: Enjoy a healthy slice of delicious vegan chocolate cake!

text: Grease the cake pan lightly. Since there is no oil in this recipe, it will stick if you skip this step. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (180 degrees C).  Stir all of the dry ingredients together in a large bowl (the first 6 on the list).  Mix all of the wet ingredients in a separate bowl.  Pour the wet mixture into the dry mixture, in two equal amounts, while mixing well after each addition, but be careful not to over mix. Just make sure there are no big lumps in the batter. Pour the batter into your prepared cake pan.  Bake for 30-35 minutes. Since ovens vary, the cake is done when it has risen to double its size, and springs back up if you press on it. Stick a toothpick in the cake to check if it is fully baked. If the toothpick is removed dry, it is ready to eat. Remove the cake from the pan after it has cooled for 5 minutes. This will be easy if you oiled the pan. Spread a vegan chocolate frosting around the cake. Enjoy a healthy slice of delicious vegan chocolate cake!
